author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Daikyo buys back 826,400 shares for 1.81 bln yen in February
text:
March 2 (Reuters) - Daikyo Inc
* Says it repurchased 826,400 shares of its common stock for 1.81 billion yen in total from Feb. 1 to Feb. 28
* Says this was part of the share repurchase plan announced on Oct. 26, 2017
* Says it accumulatively repurchased 1.7 million shares for 3.7 billion yen in total as of Feb. 28
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/kXBCDx
